App: The App is made from reusable react components from the YOS package (YNAP Open Source)
Webpack: Webpack is a JavaScript module bundler
Node.js: Originally Javascript could only be run on browsers. Node.js is a run-time environment that allows javascript to be run on a server or local machine.
Babel: Transpiles ES6 javascript to ES5, which browsers can understand
Isomorphic Development: The App is isomorphic. Isomorphic JavaScript apps are JavaScript applications that can run both client-side and server-side. The backend and frontend share the same code. The first request made by the web browser is processed by the server while subsequent requests are processed by the client.
